pkgmetadata.longdescription: OTP Auth========One time password implementations in Python. HOTP and TOTP.**Documentation**: https://otp.authlib.org/**GitHub**: https://github.com/authlib/otpauthUsage-----Most of the time, you would use a time based one time password. You can generate andverify the token with ``HOTP``:: import otpauth totp = otpauth.HOTP(b"user-secret") # generate a code for now code: int = totp.generate() # you may want to convert it to string str_code: str = totp.string_code(code) # verify the code totp.verify(code) # => True totp.verify(str_code) # => True
